overview:
Brian Gregson has created and designed operating procedures to maximize efficiencies and minimize resource constraints. He has managed major systems conversions for over 450 branches and system upgrades with seamless changes and positive impact on customers.

Brian is a Senior Banking Executive with over 20 years experience with a proven record of successfully expanding branch networks, managing a sales force, supervising operations, designing operating procedures, restructuring staffing, preparing and controlling budgets, and effectively managing projects.

He has created successful businesses by identifying businessâ€™s differentiators and developing an in depth understanding of the target market. His sales teams were always ranked at the top of his organizations employee satisfaction surveys and consistently outperformed targets. The results exceeded goals in excess of 50% and other group members subsequently used the strategy for their expansion strategies. His experience includes affluent, international and ethnic markets and how to turn the challenges these markets provide into successful business strategies.

In addition to his banking experience, Brian has 14 years experience in a top 4 accounting firm working in 3 countries. His client experience includes, manufacturing, distribution, banking, insurance, publishing, freight forwarding, tea and coffee and many other industries.
